issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Please have a look at the attached usecase.
As you can see I'm using a custom image for the window's navbar. Now when I open another window that is not covering the whole screen (or is transparent) then the navbar underneath is displayed without the custom image background.
fields.summary: window.barImage disappears when opening another window
fields.environment: SDK 1.6.2, SDK 1.7.0, SDK 1.7.1, iOS Simulator, iOS Device, iOS 4, iOS 3

comments.body:
Have you consulted with the community about this? Please provide the link to your Q&A question, and I will reopen.  See the [The Bug-Reporting Lifecycle|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-TheBugReportingLifecycle] for information about this.

Cheers
Closing issue. If any new information comes to light that justifies it, then please reopen.
